Flow.description: View Responses to Risk Assessment Questions
Flow.label: Risk Assessment: View Responses Screenflow

fields.name: RA_Display
fields.fieldText:
Risk Assessment


1 - What is the estimated annual contract value or the total project value (if a Projects contract)?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q01_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q01_Estimated_Annual_Contract_Value__c}


2 - Is the contract either a Framework or a Master Services Agreement under which multiple orders or call-offs could be placed?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q02_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q02_Framework_Master_Service_Agreement__c}


3 - Is the contract being procured under the Public Contract Regulations 2015 or the Utilities Contract Regulations 2016?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q03_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q03_Public_Contract_Utilities_Contract__c}


4 - Is the contract related to construction works or projects?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q04_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q04_Construction_or_Project__c}


5 - Is the contract for the provision of services in connection with a PFI or LIFT arrangement?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q05_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q05_PFI_or_LIFT__c}


6 - Are the services to be provided under the contract in any respect new business activities for OCS, or is the sector one in which OCS is not already operating?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q06_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q06_New_Business_Activity_or_New_Sector__c}


7 - What are the services to be delivered?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q07_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q07_Services_Delivered__c}


8 - How many staff will transfer under TUPE?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q08_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q06_New_Business_Activity_or_New_Sector__c}


9 - Is it likely that individuals TUPE'ing in will participate in an Local Government Pension Scheme (or similar scheme)?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q09_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q08_TUPE_Employees__c}


10 - Does the contract explicitly state that our liability is capped at no more than (a) £20m or (b) the level of the required insurances?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q10_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q10_Liability_Capped_20m_level_required__c}


11 - Are the payment terms 30 days from invoice date/receipt or less?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q11_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q11_Payment_Terms_Under_30_Days__c}


12 - Does the contract or our solution involve capex spend of £200,000 or more?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q12_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q12_CAPEX_200k__c}


13 - Does the contract or our solution require/involve the provision of a bond and/or payment of an upfront prebate (or similar) and/or payment of liquidated damages?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q13_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q13_Bond_Prebate_or_Liquidated_Damages__c}


14 - Does the contract include a service credit / KPI mechanism which could put at risk 5% or more of the annual contract value?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q14_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q14_Service_Credit_or_KPI_Risk_5_ACV__c}


15 - Is there an inclusive repair threshold that exceeds £1,000?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q15_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q15_Repair_Threshold_1k__c}


16 - Is the contract formed on NEC, JCT or similar standard template terms?

{!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.System_Q16_RAG__c} {!Get_Risk_Assessment_Records.Q16_Contract_Standard_Template_Terms__c}
